name: Project Alpha
description: Full-stack web application with Next.js and PostgreSQL
longDescription: A full-stack web application built with Next.js and PostgreSQL, featuring a modern design and robust functionality.

name: Project Beta
description: React Native mobile application for task management

name: Project Gamma
description: Open-source TypeScript library for data visualization
longDescription: An open-source library for data visualization built with TypeScript, providing a set of reusable components and utilities.
